explanation: Funds are required for the procurement of Low Velocity Air Drop (LVAD) as the current Amny replacement for MaxxPro vehicles provided to Ukraine in support of the international effort to counter Russian aggression. This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement.

Funds are required for the procurement of replacement Rocket, 66mm Anti-Structure M72 LAW (light anti-tank weapon) provided to Ukraine in support of the international effort to counter Russian aggression. This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement.
Funds are available and excess from Ukraine Replacement Tranche #15 due to post award contract savings. This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement.

Funds are available and excess from Ukraine Replacement Tranche #11, Ukraine Replacement Tranche #15, and Ukraine Replacement Tranche #18 due to quantity and unit cost adjustments resulting from economies of scale. This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement.
